  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-2a1b6b8d-eeac-1da0-299a-3c4b54b104ca">We work in a collaborative, fast-paced and learning-rich environment with a veteran development team anchored by accomplished leaders in engineering, design, art, publishing and more. We're always looking for talented</span>...</p></div></div></div>  </div>

<article about="/articles/20121029/531/funding-riots-play" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-npiggott even clearfix" id="node-article-531">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20121029/531/funding-riots-play" title="Funding Riot's Play">Funding Riot's Play</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Funding Riot&#039;s Play" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Rioters are gamers. We love games. As we strive to create the best player experiences, it’s important that we understand play beyond the Fields of Justice. This means that we play games...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20121029/531/funding-riots-play" rel="tag" title="Funding Riot&#039;s Play">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Funding Riot&#039;s Play</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>


<article about="/articles/20130509/567/corporate-veigar-reluctantly-spreads-holiday-cheer" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-jing odd clearfix" id="node-article-567">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20130509/567/corporate-veigar-reluctantly-spreads-holiday-cheer" title="Corporate Veigar reluctantly spreads holiday cheer">Corporate Veigar reluctantly spreads holiday cheer</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Corporate Veigar reluctantly spreads holiday cheer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
      </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20130509/567/corporate-veigar-reluctantly-spreads-holiday-cheer" rel="tag" title="Corporate Veigar reluctantly spreads holiday cheer">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Corporate Veigar reluctantly spreads holiday cheer</span></a></li></ul></nav>

</article>


<article about="/articles/20150904/233/riot-games-los-angeles" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-bsnyder even clearfix" id="node-article-233">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20150904/233/riot-games-los-angeles" title="Riot Games Los Angeles">Riot Games Los Angeles</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Riot Games Los Angeles" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-d8523468-1209-29c4-f464-85da7d62e893">Our <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20150420/1663/twas-night-our-move-la" target="_blank">new space</a> in West Los Angeles is home to central teams ranging from Design, Publishing and Engineering to Art, Esports, and Player Support. It’s where we develop</span>...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20150904/233/riot-games-los-angeles" rel="tag" title="Riot Games Los Angeles">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Riot Games Los Angeles</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>

      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list">      <h3>Application</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1479" class="faq-link">Is there any way to apply for a team that doesn’t have a position listed?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1436" class="faq-link">Why are the internship job descriptions and requirements so ambiguous?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1437" class="faq-link">I don&#039;t meet all the requirements, should I still apply?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1482" class="faq-link">How can I make my application stand out?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1483" class="faq-link">I know how to do a lot of things, which position should I apply for?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1484" class="faq-link">To whom should I address my cover letter?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1485" class="faq-link">How long should my cover letter and resume be?</a></div>  </div></li>

          <li class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even">

      </ul></div><div class="item-list">      <h3>Timeline</h3>
    <ul>          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1439" class="faq-link">BAM! I just applied, now what?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1440" class="faq-link">Can I update my application with new stuff or correct an error?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1495" class="faq-link">Is there anyone I can follow up with to check my application status or reiterate my interest?</a></div>  </div></li>
          <li class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even views-row-last">  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a href="#question-1496" class="faq-link">When will I get a response?</a></div>  </div></li>

  </div>
</div><div class="block block-views block-d4ade4b8e831a5e72199c2ad5573d017 block-views-d4ade4b8e831a5e72199c2ad5573d017 odd block-without-title" id="block-views-d4ade4b8e831a5e72199c2ad5573d017">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="view view-faq-page-questions-answers view-id-faq_page_questions_answers view-display-id-block intern-faq-questions-answers view-dom-id-ee8bcd415bcb8485cd4442129032ec09">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1430"><h4>Can I still intern if I&#039;m taking some time off or if I&#039;m in my final year of school?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d703-e822-703d-f3fbc596ba09">To qualify for an internship, you&#39;ve gotta be a full-time student in an accredited undergrad, Masters, MBA, PhD, or JD program and remain a full-time student the semester after the internship. We give heavy preference to students looking for internships for the summer before their final year of schooling. Those who&#39;ve graduated already or are graduating soon should check out our full-time openings on the <a href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers" target="_blank">Careers page.</a></span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1429"><h4>Does my citizenship matter?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d706-f66d-e30b-ba3158a584b1">No, but you&#39;ve gotta be eligible to work in the US. If you already have work authorization that makes you eligible, you&#39;re good. Unfortunately, Riot cannot guarantee work authorization assistance for intern-hopefuls.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1431"><h4>Am I old enough to apply?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d707-c8f4-c73d-2b53e4867a88">Interns must be old enough to legally work where the Riot office is located. While Rioters like to challenge convention, we don&#39;t want to challenge child labor laws! For internships in Los Angeles and St. Louis, this means you have to be at least 18.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1459"><h4>Which classes or majors will help me get an internship?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d70b-5e5b-4106-539e8133c70a">All of them. We don&rsquo;t specify which majors are a perfect match because awesome people come from the most unexpected places. We&rsquo;ve got people in marketing who come from engineering backgrounds, and people in engineering who come from liberal arts backgrounds. That said, some teams may require specific skills. Where possible, we&rsquo;ve spelled out those requirements in the job description. If you&rsquo;re thinking a few years ahead, check out the</span><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers" target="_blank"> Careers</a> page for info on the specific skills that we value in full-time Rioters.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1460"><h4>Oh noes! I have absolutely zero work experience, what do I do?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d70c-6361-c083-988805ef66a1">You don&rsquo;t need to get paid for doing something to count it as experience. Class projects, volunteer work, independent projects, and other activities (attending conferences, workshops, hackathons, and game jams) rack up experience points that enhance your capabilities and value. Riot highly prizes autodidacts, so show us what you&rsquo;ve learned.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1461"><h4>I’m good at League of Legends. Will that help?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d70d-bd6f-ebcb-cea849fd0e49">Of course we hope that you&rsquo;re familiar enough with </span><em>League of Legends </em>to jump into a game with us. Can you imagine interviewing for a job at Apple without having ever tried an iPhone or a Mac? Playing League is just table stakes. We hired a couple Diamond-level players as interns previously, but they also brought a lot of cool things to the table on top of their stellar play. On the flip side, you don&#39;t need to be a pro <em>League of Legends</em> player either. While every Rioter plays <em>League of Legends</em>, not all of us are gonna hit Plat&mdash;and that&rsquo;s okay!</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1433"><h4>Can I intern during the spring or fall semester?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p>All of our internships happen in the summer. We&#39;ve set up our intern program this way so that interns are all here at the same time. This togetherness fosters a tight-knit group experience and helps interns from varying disciplines learn from one another. Synchronizing internships also makes it easier to plan more fun group activities and play more custom 5v5 ARAMs!</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1434"><h4>If my school requires me to complete &quot;extra requirements.&quot; such as a thesis, in order to intern, am I still eligible?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d712-ac04-2e85-2483018f16d0">If you&#39;re an impressive applicant with lots of things to offer, then &quot;extra requirements&quot; won&#39;t stop us from hiring you. Our only concern would be the workload. Would you have enough time and effort to work for Riot? We don&#39;t want you to come out of the internship with bags under your eyes and gray hairs. Give us a heads-up in your cover letter and we&#39;ll figure it out together.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1470"><h4>How many interns are you looking for?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d714-449a-897f-f5eff52c85bd">We don&rsquo;t have an exact number. It could be as little as two or as many as 100. Each year, our internship class grows. Last year, we chose 46 amazing interns from over 6,000 applicants.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1471"><h4>How many intern spots are there on each team?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d716-1b13-7280-78fcf503c843">The number depends on the team, based on their needs. Some decide after they&rsquo;ve reviewed applications.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-11 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1472"><h4>Can I work from home?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d716-c8ca-7139-3d88d5bf9640">You&rsquo;re only here for a brief period, and we want you to get thick into the action, which means being in-house for fist-bumps and to collaborate tightly. So, there&rsquo;s no working from home.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-12 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1473"><h4>How will I pay for housing and transportation?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d717-863e-6761-266386acfbe6">Riot provides furnished housing for all interns near the office. We also offer a travel stipend to get you to the office and back home once the internship&#39;s done.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-13 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1474"><h4>When will I start my internship and how long is it?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> Because academic calendars vary from school to school, there will be multiple start dates; May 30 and June 13, and June 27. &nbsp;Internships last 10-12 weeks from your start date. Longer internships are possible, but shorter ones aren&#39;t because you&rsquo;ll need that time to get up to speed and contribute in a major way.
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-14 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1475"><h4>Can I intern for more than 10-12 weeks?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-854e-81d3-e96e-e3ced9b42368">Generally, no. Some summer interns have continued working during the school year, but it&rsquo;s rare.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-15 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1476"><h4>How many hours will I work per week?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d719-d853-fe0c-2e6595d34a55">Our general office hours are from 10 to 7. Interns should expect to work those hours and participate in a lot of fun extras outside of work, too. It&rsquo;s a full time gig.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-16 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1477"><h4>Could an internship turn into an actual job?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8550-2633-ccec-537b80f7be3b">Yes, one of the reasons we have an internship program is to identify (and hire) top talent who&rsquo;ll be graduating soon.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-17 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1478"><h4>I have a few more questions, where can I learn more?  </h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8551-1d56-e2ca-bbf3b6db4e72">Venture over to our</span><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/groups/3544410/3544410-6179696359273160707" target="_blank"> LinkedIn internship thread</a>&nbsp;and we&#39;ll try to answer your questions there.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-18 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1479"><h4>Is there any way to apply for a team that doesn’t have a position listed?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8553-0a0e-1d3d-d757bbc11de6">Sorry, we&#39;ve only got spots open for those teams that are listed.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-19 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1436"><h4>Why are the internship job descriptions and requirements so ambiguous?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p>We&#39;re only guessing what an intern might do nine months from now &ndash; Riot moves pretty quickly. We&#39;re looking for broadly-capable interns who can handle whatever comes their way next summer.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-20 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1437"><h4>I don&#039;t meet all the requirements, should I still apply?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71d-7d64-a9fb-9d8671825713">Maybe. Each team crafts their own job descriptions, so most of the requirements listed are pretty important, but what you&#39;re missing might not be essential. Or the person who&#39;s hiring could give you a thumbs-up if you bring spades of experience or skill in something else.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-21 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1482"><h4>How can I make my application stand out?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">There are lots of ways to stand out! We&#39;re looking for smart, talented students who carve their own tracks. The best way to show us you have what it takes is to accomplish something extraordinary: create a game or a mod, or craft a strong portfolio that demonstrates your aptitude. If you can get a &ldquo;WOW!&rdquo; or a fist-bump from your buddies, then chances are it&rsquo;s pretty incredible.</span></p>
<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Here are just a few examples of stuff former Riot NA interns did prior to applying:</span></p>
<ul>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Created high-value content on a well-known blog (or created a well-known blog)</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Started a software development company and shipped a product</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Created artwork that blew minds and won competitions</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Demonstrated mastery of critical technologies we use (e.g., Hadoop, Drupal, Scaleform and Adobe Air) by shipping products using those technologies</span></p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Led esports teams to victory in major </span><em>League of Legends</em> tournaments</p>
	</li>
	<li dir="ltr">
		<span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71e-5d52-f6b8-76eb7e9eda5b">Self-published a novel or three&nbsp;</span></li>
</ul>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-22 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1483"><h4>I know how to do a lot of things, which position should I apply for?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d71f-5a88-fe63-8c3df83632db">We love awesome and talented people who&rsquo;re good at lots of things! Do some digging to figure out where your skills intersect with your passions and see which internship fits you best. Don&rsquo;t apply for all of them! If you&rsquo;ve got a burning passion for a few teams, then give each one a shot. Come up with specific, compelling pitches for each, and let us know why you&rsquo;re the perfect fit for them. Keep in mind that applying for more positions won&rsquo;t increase your chances and spamming could hurt you.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-23 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1484"><h4>To whom should I address my cover letter?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-855f-cf52-ac29-6fdc30965c15">&ldquo;Dear Riot&rdquo; or &ldquo;Dear Rioters&rdquo; works!</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-24 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1485"><h4>How long should my cover letter and resume be?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d720-4d2b-a6a8-608a68652508">We don&rsquo;t have a hard cutoff but check with your school&rsquo;s career services office for generally accepted practices.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-25 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1486"><h4>Can I submit extra materials?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8580-e228-3501-41dfe8dd460a">Sure! Most positions require only a cover letter and resume, so anything extra is up to you as long as you can submit it electronically with your application. Use your best judgment; a link to a 10-minute monologue video is probably too much.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-26 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1487"><h4> Do I have to write my cover letter? Or can it be in whatever form I dream of?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d721-8640-23a4-2445017d746e">Feel free to be creative and flex your odd and extraordinary skills. As long as you can submit it via the app portal or we can access it online, you&rsquo;re good to go. Just keep in mind that a well-executed application is always better than a mediocre creative experiment.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-27 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1488"><h4>Should I include letters of recommendation or references?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8582-9340-222e-e195dfd5fc85">They won&rsquo;t come into play until later in the interview process, so stash them somewhere safe for now.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-28 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1489"><h4>Can you give me feedback on my application materials?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d722-ba2f-3bdf-83116007c69d">Unfortunately, we can&rsquo;t. The volume of applications is such that we&rsquo;d need a dedicated feedback team to provide comments on every application. There are resources and people in our</span><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/groups/3544410/3544410-6179696359273160707" target="_blank"> LinkedIn community</a> who may be willing to give feedback, though.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-29 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1490"><h4>Should I send in a hard copy of my application?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d723-f0a7-9f24-f52dd8d31dd9">Save a sapling and stick to using our website when submitting your materials.&nbsp;</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-30 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1491"><h4>I’m having technical issues with the application portal, who can help me?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a7e6465b-8584-ad5d-1e42-b201c1c1d0b6">Technology is funky sometimes. Head over to our</span><a href="https://www.linkedin.com/groups/3544410/3544410-6179696359273160707" target="_blank"> LinkedIn internship thread</a>&nbsp;and post your question. Someone there can help! &nbsp;</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-31 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1439"><h4>BAM! I just applied, now what?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d72c-7e2a-5969-ec2efa285c69">If your application collects sufficient kudos, we&#39;ll be in touch via email to set up some phone convos, so keep an eye on your inbox and spam folder. During these calls, we&#39;ll ask about your interests, expertise, what you want to learn from us and what we can learn from you. If the calls go well, we&#39;ll invite you to Riot for a final round of interviews and to meet the team. Riot covers flights, accommodations, food, and transportation for the interviews.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-32 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1440"><h4>Can I update my application with new stuff or correct an error?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d72d-0cd9-c082-4ef68e66aa53">There will be no way to update your application once it has been submitted. You will need to resubmit a brand new application--so it is definitely worth double checking before hitting the submit button.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-33 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1495"><h4>Is there anyone I can follow up with to check my application status or reiterate my interest?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-229a2191-d72f-1458-0840-225893d4151b">Unfortunately, no. We promise to respond to every applicant via email by the response dates listed in the FAQ and in the job descriptions.</span></p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-34 views-row-even views-row-last">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-question">        <div class="field-content"><a id="question-1496"><h4>When will I get a response?</h4></a></div>  </div>  
  <div class="views-field views-field-field-answer">        <div class="field-content"> <p dir="ltr">You&rsquo;ll hear back from us within two weeks.</p>
 </div>  </div>  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
      <div class="view-footer">
       <a id="go-to-top">Top</a>     </div>

              <h2 class="block-title">Games</h2>
            
    <div class="content clearfix">

</section>  </div>
</div><div class="grid-12 region region-footer-second" id="region-footer-second">
  <div class="region-inner region-footer-second-inner">
    <section class="block block-menu block-menu-international-landing-menu block-menu-menu-international-landing-menu odd" id="block-menu-menu-international-landing-menu">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
              <h2 class="block-title">Read About Riot Games In:</h2>
            
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <ul class="menu"><li class="first leaf"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/riot-manifesto">English</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/pt-br/o-manifesto-riot" target="_blank">Brazilian Portuguese</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/es/manifiesto-de-riot" target="_blank">Spanish</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/zh-hans/riot%E5%AE%A3%E8%A8%80" target="_blank">Simplified Chinese</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/ko/riot-manifesto" target="_blank">Korean</a></li>
<li class="leaf"><a href="http://www.riotgames.com/ja/%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%82%A2%E3%83%83%E3%83%88%E5%AE%A3%E8%A8%80">Japanese</a></li>

            Veja mais vídeos do autoesporte
            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-b91196ad-c1bd-4616-89b7-bb55044b7508');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script></div><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm2"><div id="banner_rm2" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="area-direita-b"><div class="bastian-card-mobile bastian-card-mobile-trends"><section class="gui-card" data-track-category="cards" id="g1-card-trends"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="gui-text-title js-card-trends-title"> MAIS LIDAS </h3></header><div class="g1-card-root"><div class="gui-card-content"><ul data-track-action="mais lidas" class="highlights"><li class="highlight"><a class="gui-image-hover" data-track-click="clique | posicao 1" href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/noticia/uber-suspende-teste-de-carros-autonomos-apos-acidente-nos-eua.ghtml"><div class="numerozao">

             data-servico-card="opiniao"
             data-track-category="cards"
             data-track-action="blogs"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h1 data-track-click="clique | header"
            class="gui-text-title"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/blog/oficina-do-g1/" class="gui-card-title-link" title="OFICINA DO G1">
                    OFICINA DO G1
                </a></h1></header><section class="gui-card-content meio-highlights card-opiniao-auto-size"><div class=""><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/blog/oficina-do-g1/"
               title="A embreagem mostra se você é bom motorista (Marcelo Brandt/G1)" class="card-opiniao-item-wide" ><div class="card-opiniao-foto-wide"
                 data-track-click="clique | foto | posicao 1"><img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/5TRJTDa3zmgXnvSHFB642W6TiMc=/0x0:300x300/120x120/s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2016/01/19/denis_marum_img_4803.jpg"

        title="Vai vender seu carro? G1 reúne dicas dos maiores classificados"
        data-caption="Vai vender seu carro? G1 reúne dicas dos maiores classificados"
        class="card-de-videos-item-wide gui-lightbox"
        data-type="video"
        data-video-id="5322462"
        data-short-url="http://glo.bo/2eSxkJ0"
        data-item-order="100%"><div class="gui-image-hover"><div class="gui-image-full gui-video-full"><span class="gui-overlay"></span><span class="gui-icon gui-icon-play1"></span><img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/Y19XmsgpMTN1ZikqUiq-ispoy88=/480x0/filters:max_age(3600)/s03.video.glbimg.com/deo/vi/62/24/5322462"
                    width="480"
                    height="270"
                    class="card-de-videos-item-wide-foto"

                    data-track-click="clique | thumb imagem | posicao 1"/></div><p data-track-click="clique | thumb texto | posicao 1" class="card-de-videos-item-wide-text">Vai vender seu carro? G1 reúne dicas dos maiores classificados</p></div></a></div></div></section></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-8e1854e6-ac2f-4aa3-9360-743733364a7c');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();
    </script><div data-track-category="cards" data-track-action="videos" class="gui-card card-de-videos " id="card-de-videos-6e340dda-f61c-42f6-9507-201f756236c3"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-primary-bg"><h3 class="card-de-videos-custom"><a class="gui-text-title"
                title="GUIA PRÁTICO"
                href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/guia-pratico/videos/"
                data-track-click="clique | titulo">
                GUIA PRÁTICO

            </a></h3></header><section class="gui-card-content card-de-videos-content"><div class="nano"><div class="content nano-content"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/carros/guia-pratico/videos/v/guia-pratico-104-saiba-como-funcionam-os-leiloes-de-carros/4144837/"

            <i class="gui-icon gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></a></footer></div><script type="text/javascript">
        (function () {
            var jqueryTimeout;
            var JQUERY_TIMEOUT = 1000;

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {
                jqueryTimeout = window.setTimeout(postJquerySetup, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {
                        new CardDeVideos('#card-de-videos-6e340dda-f61c-42f6-9507-201f756236c3');
                    };
                    initCard();
                    clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                } else {
                    if(document.readyState !== 'complete') {
                        jqueryTimeoutSetup();
                    }
                    else {
                        clearTimeout(jqueryTimeout, JQUERY_TIMEOUT);
                        console.log('[Card de Videos] Jquery ou CardDeVideos não foi carregado.');
                    }
                }
            };
            postJquerySetup();
        })();

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 24/03/2017 20:24:31 --></html>

ScriptsSiteiG(){this.scripts = {jquery_ui_edicao : '<scr'+'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/jquery-ui.js"> </scr'+'ipt>',jquery_ui_producao : '<scr'+'ipt src="http://js.statig.com.br/egomes/solratorec-min.js?v=1.4"></scr'+'ipt>',};}/** * Agrupa chamadas aos scripts que devem carregar */ScriptsSiteiG.prototype.baixar = function(){var self = this;/* regra para baixar somente nas homes */if ( IG_INFO.SECAO === 'home' ) {/*carregamento do script do componente LIASOLREC*/document.write( self.scripts.solratorec_compo );/* ultimo segundo */if ( IG_INFO.HOST.indexOf( 'ultimosegundo' ) > -1 || IG_INFO.SITE_ID === '4e7b756c7a6504a01e0000af' ) {document.write( self.scripts.rti30018_useg );}/* minas gerais */if ( IG_INFO.HOST.indexOf( 'minasgerais' ) > -1 || IG_INFO.SITE_ID === '51683ec081c77ab423000452' ) {document.write( self.scripts.rti30018_minas );}/* minas gerais */if ( IG_INFO.HOST.indexOf( 'brasilia' ) > -1 || IG_INFO.SITE_ID === '52fa752a7e41f8676c0006fa' ) {document.write( self.scripts.rti30018_brasilia );}}else if( IG_INFO.SECAO !== undefined && IG_INFO.SECAO !== 'home'  ){/* regra para baixar somente nas sub-homes *//*carregamento do script do componente LIASOLREC*/document.write( self.scripts.solratorec_compo );}else if( IG_INFO.SECAO === undefined ){/* regra para baixar somente nas noticias *//*carreagamento do componente RTI30018 no rodape das noticiasw*/document.write( self.scripts.noticia_real );}};/** * Agrupa chamadas a scripts que devem carregar no modo EDICAO */ScriptsSiteiG.prototype.baixarModeEdicao = function(){var self = this;document.write( self.scripts.jquery_ui_edicao );};/** * Agrupar chamadas a scripts que devem carregar no modo PUBLICADO */ScriptsSiteiG.prototype.baixarModePublicado = function(){var self = this;document.write( self.scripts.jquery_ui_producao );self.baixar();};/** * Recupera informacoes relacionadas ao site e a secao das meta tags do header do template */var head = $('head');var IG_INFO = {URL : window.location.href,SITE_ID : head.find('meta[name="iG-site-id"]').attr('content'),SECAO : head.find('meta[name="iG-secao-nome-normalizado"]').attr('content'),HOST : window.location.host};/** * Identifica em qual modo a pagina se encontra */var PAGE_MODE = {EDICAO : null,PREVIEW : null,PUBLICADO : null};if ( IG_INFO.URL.indexOf( 'edicao.html' ) > -1 ) {PAGE_MODE.EDICAO = true;} else if ( IG_INFO.URL.indexOf( 'preview' ) > -1 ) {PAGE_MODE.PREVIEW = true;} else {PAGE_MODE.PUBLICADO = true;}/** * Esconde a publicidade quando false */var showIgAd = PAGE_MODE.PUBLICADO;/** * Instancia o objeto que deve baixar scripts */var scriptsSiteiG = new ScriptsSiteiG();/* roda scripts e faz alteracoes na pagina de acordo com o MODO de EDICAO (PREVIEW, EDICAO ou PUBLICACAO) */if ( PAGE_MODE.EDICAO ) {scriptsSiteiG.baixarModeEdicao();$('body').addClass( 'mode-edicao' );} else {if ( PAGE_MODE.PREVIEW ) {$('body').addClass( 'mode-preview' );}scriptsSiteiG.baixarModePublicado();}/* se for o saudebucal adiciona uma tag para rastrear o usuário */if(IG_INFO.URL.indexOf( 'saudebucal' ) > -1 && !PAGE_MODE.EDICAO){$('head').append('<scr'+'ipt type="text/javascript" src="//nexus.ensighten.com/colgatepalmolive/Bootstrap.js"></scr'+'ipt>');}/* Verifica se o canal é Esporte e cria a função que irá definir a publicidade da TV */function initTVPub(idPublicidade){$('#'+ idPublicidade).html('');$('#'+ idPublicidade).append('<div style="width:302px;height:252px;margin: 5px 9px;" id="TVEsporteHome"></div><small>publicidade</small>');}</script><script src="http://js.statig.com.br/dropfy/dropfy-1.0.3.js"></script><script src="http://js.statig.com.br/dropfy/dropfy-1.0.3.js"></script></head><body class="secao-home secao-bread-"><script type="text/javascript">if( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].id="mobile";}</script><!-- Google Tag Manager --><noscript><iframe src="//www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-5J8MN6"height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript><script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src='//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-5J8MN6');</script><!-- End Google Tag Manager --><!-- Header --><div id="header"><div id="superbanner"><div id="PPA02114"><script type="text/javascript">if (!PAGE_MODE.EDICAO){        ws_saudebucal = '22731';        ws_AuId = "";        if(location.hostname == "saudebucal.ig.com.br"){            ws_AuId = ws_saudebucal;        }else{            ws_AuId = carrega_pub_webspectatorV2("top2");        }         var ws_unit = { "id":ws_AuId};var V2ar = true;document.write('<scr'+'ipt type="text/javascript" src="//wfpscripts.webspectator.com/ws-ad.js"></scr'+'ipt>');}</script></div></div><!-- INICIO BARRA DO IG --><div href="http://indice.ig.com.br">iG de A a Z</a></h1></hgroup><div id="oferecimento"><div id="PPA02203"></div></div><div id="busca"><form lang="atmors" action="http://busca.ig.com.br/buscar" method="get" name="search" id="buscaGoogle"  enctype="application/x-www-form-urlencoded" accept-charset="UTF-8" ><fieldset id="searchContainer"><input type="text" alt="Buscar" title="Buscar" value="" name="q" id="buscar" autocomplete="off"><input type="hidden" name="o" id="ib_o" value="-" /><input type="hidden" name="c" id="ib_c" value="all" /><input type="hidden" name="t" id="ib_t" value="all" /><input type="hidden" name="d" id="ib_d" value="all" /><input type="hidden" name="p" id="ib_p" value="1" /><input type="hidden" checked="checked" name="s" id="searchScope" value="indice-az_content"><input type="submit" class="botao-buscar" alt="Buscar" title="Buscar" value="Buscar"><div class="clear"></div><cite>enhanced by <strong>Google</strong></cite></fieldset><div "<strong></strong>" no iG</a></div><div id="searchOnBottom">&nbsp;</div></form></div></header>    <!-- Menu --><div id="menu-N">  <nav>    <ul><li class="sub Home last">  <h2 class="subhome">
    <a title="Home" href="http://indice.ig.com.br/" class="active">Home</a>
  </h2>
  <div class="menuContainer"><div class="aba"><a href="http://indice.ig.com.br/">Home</a></div></div>

</div><!-- Fim Menu -->        </div><!-- Fim Header --><!-- INICIO GERAL --><div id="geral"><!-- INICIO PRINCIPAL --><div style="width: 988px;margin: 0 auto;"><a id="fechaIntervencao" href="#"></a><div id="pubIntervencao"></div><a id="verIntervencao" href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="iGpub.x15Open();"><span>ver novamente</span></a></div><section id="principal"><!-- INICIO CONTEÚDO --> <div id="header-especial"></div><section id="conteudo"><div id="C6EC9ECF-A3DC-44DE-BB45-9A1183EFD9A4" class="faixaLimpa"><div class="glossarioGuias gd12 fl" id="060B1725-5210-4A1D-ABBA-16ABB0E2D836">
	<input type="hidden" id="idForm" value="4f3a69df97d66fe17800013a" />
	<input type="hidden" id="qtdeItens" value="1000" />
	
	<div id="busca-glossario-indice" class="borda">		
		<div>
			<ul id="aba_busca-indices">
				<li class="ativo link_1"><a href="">Sites</a><div class="left"></div><div class="right"></div></li>
				<li class="busca link_2"><a href="">Blogs e Colunas</a><div class="left"></div><div class="right"></div></li>				
			</ul>
		</div>
			
		<div class="box-indice">
			<ul id="indice">
				<li><a href="#A">A</a></li>
				<li><a href="#B">B</a></li>
				<li><a href="#C">C</a></li>
				<li><a href="#D">D</a></li>

		    <div style="float:right;">
			<label for="">Filtrar <span>sites</span> por categoria</label>
		    
		    
			<select name="" id="categoria" class="dropfy">
			    <option>Selecione...</option>

		</div>
		
		
		
		<h3 class="error">
		    Ops! Nenhuma ocorrência com a letra <span class="letra">E</span> foi encontada.
		    <small>Escolha outra letra ou clique na opção "Todos"</small>   
		</h3>
		
	<div class="clear"></div>

<script type="text/javascript">

var categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
    canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';
  
var verificaEditor = /(edicao\.html)|(homeeditor)|(localhost)/,
	verificaEditorPreview=/edicaoHomes\/preview/,
	editor = (verificaEditor.test(location.href) && !verificaEditorPreview.test(location.href)) ? true : false;
        
var glossario = {};
              

function montaResults(data){
              
              $('#results').html('');
              glossario = {};
              
              var results = data.results;
              for(var i in results){
                            
                            if(typeof glossario[results[i].letra] == 'undefined'){
                                          glossario[results[i].letra] = [];               
                            }
                            
                            glossario[results[i].letra].push(results[i]);
                            
              }
              
              var lista = '';
              for(var letra in glossario){
                            
                            lista = '';
                            
                            var i = 1;
                            for(var item in glossario[letra]){
                                          
                                          var item = glossario[letra][item];
                                          
                                          className = "col3-"+Math.ceil(i%3);
                                          
                                          
                                          if(i%2 == 0){
                                                        className += " col2-2";
                                          }else{
                                                        className += " col2-1";
                                          }
                                          
                                          i++;
                                          
                                          
                                          
                                          if(typeof item.imagem != 'undefined' && item.imagem.length){
                                              var imagem = '<img src="'+item.imagem+'" alt="" width="96" height="96" />';
                                          }else{
                                              var imagem = '';
                                          }
                                          
                                          lista += '<li class="'+className+'">'+
                                                        imagem +
                                                        '<h4>'+'<a href="'+item.link+'">'+item.titulo+'</a>'+'</h4>'+
                                                        '<p>'+'<a href="'+item.link+'">'+item.descricao+'</a>'+'</p>'+
                                                   '</li>';
                                          
                            }
                            
                            
                            $('#results').append('<div class="box-item letra-'+letra+'">'+
                                                        '<h3 class="letter">'+letra+' '+'<a href="#busca-glossario-indice" class="backtop">Topo</a>'+'</h3>'+
                                                        '<ul class="lista-glossario">'+lista+'</ul>'+
                                          '</div>'+
                                          '<div class="clear"></div>');
              }
              
   
}
 
 
$("#indice a") .click(function(e){
  e.preventDefault();
  
  var letra = $(this).html();
  $("#indice li").removeClass("ativo");
  $(this).parent().addClass("ativo");
  $('.error').hide();
  
  if(letra == 'Todos'){
  	$('.box-item').show();
  }else{
              
        $('.box-item').hide();
        
        if($('.letra-'+letra).length > 0){
              $('.letra-'+letra).show();      
        }else{
              $('.error').show();
              $('.error span.letra').html(letra);
        }
        
  }  
    
})


function atualizaCategorias(){
var categorias = '';
$.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+'}&order={"categoria":1}'),function(data){
    
    $(".box-drop").remove();
    $("select#categoria").html('<option value="">Selecione ...</option>');
    
    $.each(data.results,function(i,item){
        
    	if(item.categoria.search(',') > -1){
    		
    		var cs = item.categoria.split(",");
    		
    		for(var c in cs){
    			if(categorias.toLowerCase().search(cs[c].toLowerCase().replace(/^\s*/,"").replace(/\s*$/,"")) == -1){
    	            categorias += cs[c].replace(/^\s*/,"").replace(/\s*$/,"") + '##';   
    	        }
    		}
    		
    	}else{
    		if(categorias.toLowerCase().search(item.categoria.toLowerCase()) == -1){
                categorias += item.categoria + '##';   
            }
    	}
    	
        
    })
    
    categorias = categorias.split("##");
    categorias.sort();
    
    $.each(categorias,function(i,cat){
        
        if(cat.length > 0){
            $("select#categoria").append('<option value="'+cat+'">'+cat+'</option>');
        }
        
    })
    
    $('select#categoria').dropfy();
    
    $('ul.drop-extended a').click(function(e){
                            
        e.preventDefault();
        
        var categoria = $(this).html();
        
        
        $("#indice li").removeClass("ativo");
        
        if($(this).html().toLowerCase().search('selecione') > -1){
                $.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+'}&order={"letra":1,"titulo":1}'),function(data){
                            montaResults(data);
              });
        }else{
              
              $.get(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+canalFilter+',"categoria":{"$regex":"'+categoria+'","$options":"ig"}}&order={"letra":1,"titulo":1}'),function(data){
                            montaResults(data);
              });
        }       
                
        return false;
        
    })    
    
    
})
}        


var categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
    canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';  


$('.link_2 a').click(function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              
              
              $('#aba_busca-indices .ativo').removeClass('ativo');
              $(this).parent().addClass('ativo');
              
              
              categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
              canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"Blogs e Colunas","$options":"gi"}';   
              
              $('.filtro-categoria label span').html('blogs e colunas');
              
              $.getJSON(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+categoriaFilter+','+canalFilter+'}&order={"titulo":1}&limit=999'),function(data){
                                          
                            montaResults(data);
                                          
              })
              
              $("#results").removeClass("sites").addClass("blogs");
              
              $('#indice a:last').click();
              atualizaCategorias();
              return;
})


$('.link_1 a').click(function(e){
              e.preventDefault();
              
              
              $('#aba_busca-indices .ativo').removeClass('ativo');
              $(this).parent().addClass('ativo');
              
              $('.filtro-categoria label span').html('sites');
              
              categoriaFilter = '"categoria" : {"$regex":".","$options":"gi"}',
              canalFilter = '"canal" : {"$regex":"[^(Blogs e Colunas)]","$options":"gi"}';  
              
                              
              $.getJSON(encodeURI('/bancos_editoriais_search/'+$('#idForm').val()+'/_find?criteria={'+categoriaFilter+','+canalFilter+'}&order={"titulo":1}&limit=999'),function(data){
                                          
                            montaResults(data);
                                          
              })
              
              $("#results").removeClass("blogs").addClass("sites");                              
              $('#indice a:last').click();
              
              atualizaCategorias();
              
              return;
})


if(window.location.hash == "#blogs"){
	$('.link_2 a').click();
}else{
	$('.link_1 a').click();
}
  
</script></div><div class="HTE14706 gd6 fl" id="28E305A7-CEA9-447B-BF2D-E973396E0141">
	<div><style>
.glossarioGuias{width:988px}
#cabecalho h1 a, #cabecalho a.logo {width:230px}
#indice{width:626px}
</style></div>
</div></div></section><!-- FIM CONTEÚDO --> <!-- INICIO BARRA LATERAL --><aside id="barra-lateral"></aside><!-- FIM BARRA LATERAL --><!-- INICIO RODAPÉ --><div class="auth-mail-footer-wrapper" id="inner-footer">  <div class="auth-mail-footer-container">    <a href="http://ig.com.br" class="auth-mail-footer-logo-ig"><img src="//i0.statig.com.br/webmail/novo-webmail-ig/img/auth-mail-footer-logo.png"></a>    <nav role="navigation">      <ol class="auth-mail-footer-menu">        <li><a href="http://indice.ig.com.br/" title="Todos os sites do iG - O mundo é de quem faz">Sites iG</a></li><!--       --><li><a href="http://produtos.ig.com.br/" title="Conheça os produtos iG.">Produtos iG</a></li><!--      --><li><a href="http://centraldoanunciante.ig.com.br/" title="Central do Anunciante iG: saiba como anunciar no iG">Anuncie</a></li><!--       --><li><a href="http://images.ig.com.br/politica_privacidade/index.html" title="Conheça a Política de Privacidade">Política de Privacidade</a></li><!--      --><li><a href="http://faleconosco.ig.com.br/" title="Fale Conosco">Fale conosco</a></li>      <li><a href="http://www.ig.com.br/cupons" title="iG Cupons">iG Cupons</a></li>      </ol>    </nav>     <p class="auth-mail-footer-copyright">© Copyright 2000-2015, iG Publicidade e Conteúdo Ltda: iG e iBest</p>    <script type="text/javascript">      var placeholder = document.querySelector('.auth-mail-footer-copyright'); href="http://g1.globo.com/rr/roraima/noticia/2017/03/mais-de-47-mil-ainda-nao-declararam-imposto-de-renda-em-roraima.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Mais de 47 mil ainda não declararam Imposto de Renda em Roraima</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Até essa sexta-feira (24), pouco mais de 12 mil haviam entregue o IR 2017.
Prazo para o envio das informações termina em 28 de abril deste ano.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item"                         Sol e aumento de nuvens de manhã. Pancadas de chuva à tarde e à noite.

       class="link-plantao">últimas notícias</a></div></div><div id="glb-rodape" class="widget_rodape_container"><div class="footer product-color" data-ga-area="footer"><div class="grid-12 container row clearfix" data-ga-marker="links"><div class="column"><ul class="first-line"><li class="ib middle"><a class="logo" href="//globo.com/" title="Globo.com">Globo.com</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//g1.globo.com/">g1</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globoesporte.globo.com/">globoesporte</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//gshow.globo.com/">gshow</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//famosos.globo.com/">famosos & etc</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globotv.globo.com/">vídeos</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//www.globo.com/todos-os-sites.html">todos os sites</a></li><li class="pushed ib middle"><span>Globo Notícias</span></li></ul><span class="pull-left">&copy;                   media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 20:08:11 --></html>

  });(function() {var ga = document.createElement("script");ga.type = "text/javascript";ga.async = true;ga.src = ("https:" == document.location.protocol ? //--><!]]>
</script>

<h1>2015</h1>

<article about="/articles/20150526/1672/rioter-talks-gdc-2015" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund odd clearfix" id="node-article-1672">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20150526/1672/rioter-talks-gdc-2015" title="Rioter Talks: GDC 2015">Rioter Talks: GDC 2015</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Rioter Talks: GDC 2015" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p dir="ltr"><span id="docs-internal-guid-9b0ac49c-35ea-ebce-5c9a-a588ff69e912">Rioters joined fellow game developers at GDC 2015 to share stories and lessons learned. </span>No need to scour the <a href="http://www.gdcvault.com/" target="_blank">Vault</a>, here are this year’s talks.</p> <ul><li> <span></span></li>...</ul></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20150526/1672/rioter-talks-gdc-2015" rel="tag" title="Rioter Talks: GDC 2015">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Rioter Talks: GDC 2015</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>


<article about="/articles/20150522/1676/rioter-talks-pax-east-2015" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund even clearfix" id="node-article-1676">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20150522/1676/rioter-talks-pax-east-2015" title="Rioter Talks: PAX East 2015">Rioter Talks: PAX East 2015</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Rioter Talks: PAX East 2015" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Riot’s music team wanted to bring a little more to their panel at PAX East 2015, so they brought...a flute, a keyboard, a cello, a drum set, a guitar, a viola, two violins, musicians...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20150522/1676/rioter-talks-pax-east-2015" rel="tag" title="Rioter Talks: PAX East 2015">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Rioter Talks: PAX East 2015</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>


<article about="/articles/20150522/1675/rioter-talks-pax-south-2015" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-teaser node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-tsigmund odd clearfix" id="node-article-1675">
        <header>
    <h2 class="node-title"><a href="/articles/20150522/1675/rioter-talks-pax-south-2015" title="Rioter Talks: PAX South 2015">Rioter Talks: PAX South 2015</a></h2>
  </header>
    <span property="dc:title" content="Rioter Talks: PAX South 2015" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><p>Rioters gathered in San Antonio for the first ever PAX South. With a room of fellow PAX pioneers, they hosted a game design panel and audience Q &amp; A to discuss good and bad...</p></div></div></div>  </div>
  
  <div class="clearfix">
          <nav class="links node-links clearfix"><ul class="links inline"><li class="node-readmore first last"><a href="/articles/20150522/1675/rioter-talks-pax-south-2015" rel="tag" title="Rioter Talks: PAX South 2015">Read more<span class="element-invisible"> about Rioter Talks: PAX South 2015</span></a></li></ul></nav>
    
      </div>
</article>

    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>
